prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that resembles a jellyfish with a haunting appearance.
I want a vibrant blue water-type Pokemon that floats elegantly in the ocean.
Generate a playful Pokemon with a round body and tentacles, perfect for underwater adventures.
Make a spooky jellyfish Pokemon with glowing features and a mysterious aura.
Imagine a unique Pokemon that can change colors, combining shades of blue and white.
Design a water/ghost-type Pokemon that loves to play tricks on unsuspecting trainers.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the sea and has a whimsical form.
